ygData.subject: Re: DOWNLOAD TROUBLE
ygData.msgSnippet: With my 56k modem it took us approximately 25 hours to download. That s with give or take 2 hours for times we disconnected for phone use. Personally,
ygData.messageBody:
With my 56k modem it took us approximately 25
hours to download. That's with give or take 2 hours for
times we disconnected for phone use. <br>Personally,
though I love the game, I find it very unprofessional
and disrespective of those without high speed
connections. I paid for all the system requirements, the
expansion, etc.<br>I don't have DSL nor the cable modem
available in my area. I was caught between a rock and hard
place where this patch was concerned.<br>Sad<br>Jessica
